feature: Make privacy policy text a clickable link in waitlist form
description: Convert the 'privacy policy' text in the waitlist form checkbox label to an actual link that opens the /privacy page

phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Update the waitlist form to make privacy policy text clickable

subtasks.title: Add Link import and update FormLabel
subtasks.description: Import the Next.js Link component and modify the privacy checkbox FormLabel to wrap 'privacy policy' text in a clickable link pointing to /privacy. The link should open in a new tab to avoid disrupting the form flow, and should have appropriate styling (underline, hover effect) to indicate it's interactive.
acceptance_criteria: Link component is imported from next/link
privacy policy text is wrapped in a Link component
Link has visual styling to indicate it's clickable
Clicking the link does not trigger the checkbox

subtasks.title: Manual verification
subtasks.description: Verify the link is visible, clickable, and opens /privacy in a new tab. Ensure clicking the link does not accidentally toggle the checkbox.
acceptance_criteria: Link is visually distinct as clickable text
Link opens /privacy page in new tab when clicked

final_acceptance: Privacy policy text is a clickable link in the waitlist form
Link opens /privacy page in new tab
